verbs.description: irresistible coconut cream pie [ARG0: my husband and i] [V: grow] [ARG1: 500 acres of wheat] [ARGM-LOC: on the farm] his family homesteaded in 1889 i grind my own flour and love to use it in this recipe the easy pat - in crust has a rich grain flavor it irresistible filled with old - fashioned coconut cream and topped with a fluffy meringue —roberta foster kingfisher oklahoma cream pie cream
